loans.name: Gbenonkpo Af2 Group

texts.fr: GBENONKPO AF2 est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres sont des amies et résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Anifath Celestine (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 40 ans. Anifath Celestine est mariée à un pêcheur du nom de Tidjani. Le couple a cinq enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Anifath Celestine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Anifath Celestine n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Anifath Celestine vend depuis quinze ans de la nourriture (pâte de maïs, riz, accompagné de sauce aux poissons) ; et de façon secondaire des tissus à son domicile. Anifath Celestine s’approvisionne au Benin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue élargir son activité, Anifath Celestine sollicite un sixième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GBENONKPO AF2. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits. Les crédits antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Gbenonkpo AF2 is a group of three friends who all live in the same neighbourhood. The group’s representative is Anifath Celestine (holding up her hand in the photo). 

Anifath Celestine is 40 years old and married to a fisherman named Tidjani. The couple has five children to support, all of whom are in school. Anifath Celestine lives with her husband and children, and the couple together ensure that household expenses are met. 

Anifath Celestine did not go to school. In order to contribute to living expenses, Anifath Celestine has been selling food for 15 years (corn mash and rice, with fish sauce). Her secondary business is selling cloth from home. Anifath Celestine buys her produce in Benin. 

In order to satisfy her customers and expand her business, Anifath Celestine is requesting a sixth loan from Alidé along with the other members of the Gbenonkpo AF2 group. This loan will help them to better respond to the needs of their customers and increase their profits. The previous loans have all been repaid.

loans.use: to buy maize, rice, fish and condiments.

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amneh is a 41 year-old woman. She is married and a mother to five sons and four daughters. Her husband is a farmer and works in agriculture. Amneh is a school employee who gets low salary, but it is not enough to cover the family's needs and pay the education expenses. 

Amneh's son is studying at the university, specializing in law. Amneh wants to help her son to complete his studies by paying the university fees, so she is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her son cover the university fees. This will ensure a better future for her son and improve the family's living conditions. Amneh is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: to pay her son's university fees.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is 24 years old and married with 2 children living in Hioma,Uganda. He owns a motorcycle that he uses for a transportion business and he has been in this business for 4 years. He started as a farmer then saved to buy his first motorcycle.
 
He faces challenges of seasonal variations and high fuel costs. His family goal is to educate his children and build a permanent house. He wishes to buy land in the future for farming and hiring employees to help him out in the business. Emmanuel intends to use the loan to buy another motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy a new motorcycle.

loans.name: Fishery Busines Association Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you members of the “Fishery Business Association” group. They are small scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 600,000 Sierra Leonean Leones for each of them in order to invest in their businesses. 

Isata is the leader of this group. Isata is 42 years old and married with five children – one in primary school and two in secondary school. Isata sells fish and has been doing this business for many years now. With the help of this loan, she will invest in her business by buying a carton of fish to add to her current stock.

loans.use: To buy a carton of fish to add to her current stock

loans.name: Tamam

texts.en:
Tamam is a 29-year-old young woman and a nurse. She is married to a schoolteacher and is the mother of two sons and three daughters. Both her husband’s and her salaries are not enough to meet all of the family’s needs.

Tamam is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her buy a car (in the photo she is next to the one she plans to purchase). It will enable Tamam to get to work quickly and around the city more easily. A car will improve her family’s life.

loans.use: to help her buy a car.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson is a thirty-four-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda.  He has a personal goal of educating his children up to the university level.  He has been a teacher for the last ten years and is so proud of his profession despite the challenges of having a low salary.  He has a vision of becoming one of the best teachers in the district and setting up an income generating activity to supplement his meager income.  Wilson needs the loan facility to buy land.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is a shoemaker in Nakuru town. He makes shoes to sell in his business and repairs shoes. He is 21 years old and married to Selina. They have three children.

This will be his first loan from KADET LTD and he plans to use this loan to buy more stock of leather and shoe soles for making shoes. This will enable him to increase his stock of shoes as well as make more income and improve the living standards of his family.

In the future, George hopes to grow his business and become a shoe supplier to various retailers, schools and markets.

loans.use: To add more stock of leather and shoe soles.

loans.name: Harry Bossa

texts.en: Harry Bossa is a 62-year-old married man with 10 children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His personal goal has been to educate his children up to the university level. He is a tailor and has been in service for the last 13 years. His main hardships are price fluctuations and inadequate capital to purchase raw materials. However, he has a vision of expanding his business to new markets. Harry Bossa needs a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Luai

texts.en:
Luai is a 35-year-old man.  He is married and a father to three sons and one daughter.

For the past ten years, Luai has been selling basic kitchen supplies and food in a stall. This has been a profitable project, but he also needs more support to cover the family's needs, especially since this is the only source of income for his family.

Luai is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a large amount of summer fruits and vegetables that customers usually request and buy. This will give Luai a better collection of fruits and vegetables, which will help him to increase his sales and improve his family's income.

Luai is photographed next to his stall.

loans.use: To purchase a large amount of fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fodder for her sheep.

loans.name: Busamba 11. Yahura Yohoza Tweimukye Group

texts.en: Jane is a thirty-eight-year-old hardworking lady living in Fort Portal, Uganda.  She has a personal goal of building a permanent home and has been a retailer after getting start up capital from her family.  Jane is facing the hardship of inadequate capital to purchase stock.  However, she has a vision of diversifying her business to include farming and has applied for a loan to help her buy general merchandise for resale.

loans.use: to buy general merchadise for resale.

loans.name: Mostafa

texts.en:
Mostafa is a 27-year-old young man who is married but with no children yet. For the past five years he has been operating a hair salon (the photo shows him working in his shop). His business is a profitable one, but he needs more money to cover the couple’s needs.

Mostafa is requesting a 1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the cost of buying more salon supplies such as hair dryers and different types of hair brushes and scissors. This will improve the quality of his work and further satisfy his loyal customers. He feels this will lead to more customers and so improve his income.

loans.use: to buy more salon supplies.

loans.name: Gular

texts.ru:
Gular 27 let. Ona zamujem i imeyet 2 detey. Gular 2 goda kak zanimayetsya pticevodstvom i razvodit kuric. Ona ochen nujdayetsya  v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit kuricci chtobi uvelichit svoy bizness. Ona nujdayetysa v uvelicheniye svoix mesachnix doxodov chtobi pomoch svoim roditelyam tak kak oni pojeliye.
Gular yavlyayetsya IDP personom ona pereselenec iz Fizuli goroda , seychas projivayet v Fizuli regione vmeste so svoim mujem i detmi.
texts.en: Gular is 27 years old, married and has two children.  She has been involved in poultry farming and breeding chickens for two years.  She very much needs 2000 AZN to buy chickens in order to expand her business.  She needs to increase her monthly income to help her parents because they are elderly.  Gular is an IDP from the city of Fuzuli and currently lives in the Fuzuli region with her husband and children.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amneh is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Nidal appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Amneh is a 25-year-old young woman, she is married to Nidal and a mother to one son.  She and her husband are farmers working in agriculture, which is their only source of income, and are in need of more support to cover the family's needs.

Amneh is requesting a youth loan of USD 1,000 from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing seeds and seedlings for planting in the summer season. This will offer Amneh and her husband the ability to get better crops, increase sales and improve the family's income positively.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley is 26 years old and she supports a family of two. She has run a cosmetic shop in Kabarnet for the last three years, with a monthly income of KES 25,000.
 
Shirley has borrowed her first loan of KES 27,000 from KADET LTD, and she intends to use the whole amount to purchase an assorted stock of cosmetics for her business. With the anticipated profits she intends to reinvest back into the business by introducing other products.

Her future plan is to expand her business, possibly buy a property for her business, and also give the best education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase an assorted stock of cosmetics.

loans.name: Betty Margot

texts.es:
Betty es una mujer de 54 años de edad, es madre de tres hijos, los cuales ya son mayores de edad; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, así como también en él se desarrolla la agricultura. Betty es una mujer luchadora y sobre todo siempre ha dado todo de si para sacar adelante a sus hijos y para ella es un gran logro haberlo hecho; por ello siempre fue muy optimista, con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de venta de artesanías y poco a poco fue saliendo adelante y ahorrando y luego aumento su negocio vendiendo tortas y mazamorras, mas adelante luego de ahorrar logro comprar un carrito sanguchero y empezó a vender salchipollos y hamburguesas, al principio Betty tuvo miedo de salir a las calles a vender sus productos por un poco de vergüenza, pero poco a poco fue acostumbrándose y perdió esa vergüenza, luego de ello cuando empezó a vender sus hamburguesas en el mercado de su ciudad le fue un poco difícil ya que como vendía a las afueras no le permitían estar allí, pero luego de un tiempo logro alquilar pequeño local en el mercado y siguió mejorando, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy trabajadora y porque trata de manera amable al cliente.

Betty está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar artesanías para vender en el día de la adre, además podrá comprar una olla arrocera para cocinar sus salchipollos y hamburguesas, así ella mejorara sus ingresos y podrá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un local propio”.
texts.en:
Betty, 54, is the mother of 3 adult children.  Her house is located in the city of Imperial.  This is a city that is known for its mild and pleasant weather and also for its agriculture.  Betty is a tenacious woman, who most of all has always given 100% to provide for her children.  This has been a great accomplishment of hers, and  to do it she has always been very optimistic.  She put in a lot of effort to start up her business selling handicrafts.  Gradually, she started to get ahead, and later she added a business selling cakes and corn pudding.  Then, after saving up some money, she bought a food cart and started selling salchipollos (a dish with fried chicken and fried potatoes) and hamburgers.  At first, Betty was afraid to go out into the streets to sell her products, because she was a little shy.  But she gradually got used to it and lost this fear.  After that, when she started selling her hamburgers in the market in her city, it was a bit difficult for her because as she was selling outside, they would not allow her to be there.  But she eventually managed to rent a small spot in the market and kept improving her business.  She believes that her business is succeeding because she is very hardworking and because she treats her customers in a very friendly way.

Betty is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help that they have provided her with, she will be able to buy handicrafts to sell for Mother's Day.  She will also purchase a rice cooker to cook her chicken and hamburgers.  This way she will improve her income and will be able to continue working toward realizing her biggest dream: to have her own restaurant.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts and a rice cooker

loans.name: Zenfira

texts.ru: Zenfira uje 11 let kak zanimayetsya prodajey pishevix produktov, i 7 let kak imeyet svoy magazin. Ona ne zamujem. Jivet Zenfira v Fizuli regione , ona pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda kotoriy yavlyayetysa okkupirovannimi territoriyami. i yavlyayetsya IDP personom. Zenfira seychas nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi uvelichit pomesheniye svoyego magazina dlya razmesheniya bolshe tovarov. V dolneyshem ona xochet razmestit tam moyushiye sredstva dlya prodaji.
texts.en: Zenfira has been involved in selling food products for 11 years and has had her own store for seven.  She is not married.  Zenfira lives in the Fuzuli region.  She moved from the city of Fuzuli, which is an occupied territory, and is an IDP.  Zenfira currently needs 2000 AZN to increase her store space in order to include more merchandise.  In the future, she wants to use this space to sell cleaning supplies.

loans.use: to increase her store space

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is a 40-year-old married woman. She has two children who are four and nine years old. She describes herself as confident and determined.

For the past four years Regina has operated a store where she sells items such as flour, cooking oil, sugar, detergent, etc. She employs one staff member. Her business is located in a residential area and her primary customers are local residents. High rent and the cost of household goods are her biggest business challenges.

Regina is requesting a 20,000 KES loan from SMEP to buy more household goods to sell. Her ambition is to run a wholesale shop within five years. She would also like to build a house for her family as well as some rental housing.

loans.use: to buy more household goods to sell.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client aged 18, single, and lives with one family member who works.

Ahmad is a barber. He opened his own shop in 2010, where he offers shaving and massage services. He has sufficient experience in this field and has a good reputation. His shop is situated in a crowded area so there are a good number of customers passing by.

He is requesting a $3,000 "youth loan" to pay the annual rent for his shop and to purchase a split air conditioner. He is aiming to gain more profit so he can improve his family’s quality ofr life.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his shop and to purchase a split air conditioner.

loans.name: Jorge Carlos

texts.es:
Jorge es un joven de 28 años el cual vive al lado de su esposa y juntos tienen un pequeño de 1 año de edad y el cual es su adoración y sobre todo es su motor para salir adelante y mejorar cada día, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Pisco, esta ciudad se caracteriza pero tener un clima cálido y acogedor, en el podremos encontrar playas hermosas, así como también atractivos turísticos hermosos como “Las Islas Ballestas y el Candelabro de Paracas”. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos de su barrio, asimismo le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Ají de Gallina”. El solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar administración de empresas.

Día a Día Jorge sale a trabajar con mucho entusiasmo en su negocio de alquiler de video juegos y Tipeos, el le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 25 clientes en el día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque su negocio se encuentra en una zona muy transitada y sobre todo por la buena atención a los clientes.

Jorge está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar televisores para su negocio de videojuegos y también realizar unos mejoramientos de la vivienda donde vive, en especial el tarrajeo de las paredes y pondrá piso; con esta mejora podrá tener mayores ingresos, así como también dará una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, así seguirá luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia ya que donde vive actualmente es alquilado”.
texts.en:
Jorge is a young man of 28 who lives with his wife and their one year old child. He adores his child, who is his motivation for getting ahead in life and working to make each day a better one.  He lives in Pisco, a city with a warm and welcoming climate, with beautiful beaches and tourist attractions, such as “Las Islas Ballestas and "el Candelabro de Paracas”. 

When he has free time, he likes to play football with his friends and neighbours from his neighbourhgood, and also enjoys a plate of his favourite dish, "Ají de Gallina".  He only studied to secondary school level, but he would have liked to study Business Administration.

Jorge goes to work enthusiastically each day, to his video and computer game rental business.  He works around 10 hours a day and can have up to 25 customers in a day.  He believes his business does well because it is situated in a busy area and above all, because of excellent customer service.

Jorge is very grateful for the Kiva loans, as, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy television sets for his videogame business and also make some home improvements, particularly the wall threading, and he'll carpet the floor.

With these improvements he'll be able to make a higher income and provide a better quality of life for his family.  So he will continue to battle on every day to make his biggest dream come true:  to own his own home, as his present home is rented.

loans.use: to buy television sets and to make home improvements

loans.name: Elnara

texts.ru:
Elnara yavlyayetsya IDP personom, ona pereselenec iz Fizuli goroda, seychas ona jivet v Fizuli regione vmeste so svoyey drujelubnoy semyoy. Elnara 32 goda. Ona zamujem i imeyet 3 detey. 
Elnara seychas nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit kuricci, a takje utok i gusey dlya razvitiya svoyego biznessa. Ona uje 6 let kak  zanimayetsya pticevodstvom i razvodit kuric. No seychas ona xochet krome kuricci takje razvodit utok i gusey, chtobi zdelat novshestva i razvitiya v svoyom biznesse.
texts.en: Elnara is an IDP from the city of Fuzuli and currently lives in the Fuzuli region with her friendly family.  Elnara is 32 years old, married and has three children.  She currently needs 2000 AZN to buy chickens, ducks and geese in order to develop her business.  She has been involved in poultry farming for six years and breeds chickens.  Right now, Elnara wants to breed ducks and geese in addition to chickens in order to introduce novelties and make developments in her business.

loans.use: to buy chickens, ducks and geese

loans.name: Lesya

texts.ru:
Леся замужем. Ее супруга зовут Николай. У них есть маленький сын. Леся имеет свой бизнес.

Леся продает канцтовары и детские игрушки в магазине, который находится  между двумя школами. Конкурентов нет. Леся приятный человек, умеет общаться с покупателями. Она трудолюбивая и ответственная. У нее хорошие отношения в семье. Муж помогает с бизнесом.

Леся просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 15000 гривен на закупку товара для выездной торговли. Благодаря кредиту она сможет получить дополнительный доход  с другой торговой точки.
texts.en: Lesya is married, her husband's name is Nikolai, and they have a small son.  Lesya has her own business.  She sells office supplies and children's toys at a store, located between two schools.  She has no competition.  Lesya is a nice person and knows how to communicate with customers well.  She is hardworking and responsible.  She has a good relationship with her family, and her husband helps her with the business.  Lesya is requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 hryvnia to buy merchandise for traveling sales.  Thanks to the loan, she would be able to earn an additional income from another retail outlet.

loans.use: to increase merchandise inventory

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann is a 42-year-old married woman with three children from nine to 24 years old. She describes herself as honest. Ann operates a farm and sells dairy cows and pigs. She has been in this business for ten years and employs one staff member. Her business is located in a residential area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes the lack of a ready market for selling pigs as her biggest business challenge.

Ann previously requested and repaid three loans of 70,000 KES. She is planning to use the current 30,000 KES loan to purchase livestock. Her business goal is to be the leading poultry supplier in Karatina town within five years. She hopes that, in the future, the anticipated profits will help her to build a house for her family as well as building rental houses to increase her monthly income.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Joshua

texts.en:
Joshua is 40 years old, married, and blessed with seven children between 24 and six years old. He runs a business leasing solar panels and earns a monthly income of 5,000 KES. 

Joshua has borrowed his first loan, at 20,000 KES, from KADET LTD. With this loan he intends to purchase more solar panels to boost his income. Joshua’s plan is to save money to educate his children.

His dreams and hopes are to improve his business, build a business premises, and give the best education to his children.

loans.use: to purchase solar panels for leasing.

loans.name: Emin

texts.ru: Emin 42 qoda. On jenat i imeyet 4 detey. Yego mnogodetnaya semya i on jivut v Fizuli regione, oni yavlyayutsya IDP personami i pereselenci iz Fuzuli goroda. Emin uje 12 let kak imeyet svoy taxi, yego mashina uje staraya i ona chasto portitsya. Emin seychas nujdayetsya v 1000 AZN chtobi pochinit svoyu mashinu za etu summu. V budushem on xochet pomenat svoyu mashinu na drguyu dlya razvitiya i uludsheniya svoyego biznessa. I tem samim uvelichit svoyi mesachniye doxodi.
texts.en: Emin is 42 years old, married and has four children.  He has a large family and lives in the Fuzuli region.  He is an IDP from the city of Fuzuli.  Emin has had his own taxi for 12 years, but his car is already old and breaks down frequently.  Emin currently needs 1000 AZN to repair his car for this amount.  In the future, he wants to replace his car with another one in order to develop and improve his business and, thus, increase his monthly income.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Salim

texts.en:
Salim is a 28-year-old hard working and friendly man. He is married and has two children. 

Salim is engaged in cattle breeding, and he sells meat and milk products at the bazaar. He also works as a master of home repair. 

Salim applied for a loan of 1,500 AZN to finish the building of his own house.

loans.use: to finish building his own house.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph, 71, is from Ndunyu Njeru and married with four grown up children.

Joseph has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to buy a heifer to boost his dairy farming. He is optimistic that the loan will improve his business.

He hopes to concentrate on dairy farming in the near future.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is 39 years old. He is married to Ann and together they have two children, both under 10 years old. He is a cobbler and has been in the business for the past 11 years. He earns a monthly salary of 15,000 KES.

This is his first loan from KADET LTD, after being introduced by a friend. He will use the loan amount to purchase leather and soles for use in his business. He hopes to own a local shoe-making industry so as to provide for the basic needs of his family.

loans.use: to purchase leather and soles

loans.name: Club De La Amistad Group

texts.es: La Sra. Maria tiene  50  años de edad,  es conviviente  y tiene 7 hijos, Maria actualmente es socia en la alcancía comunal “Club de la Amistad” grupo  conformado por 08  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio.  Maria  se dedica a la venta de golosinas; a su vez vende tamales los días domingo. Maria  inicia este negocio con el fin de ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que tenian que mantener 7 hijos, Maria trabajo muy duro para lograr lo que hoy en dia tiene, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a hecho el piso en su casa y cuartos, y sus ingresos se siguen incrementando. Maria  ha solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar insumos es decir dulces.  Maria  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Sra. Maria is 50 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has seven children.  She is currently a member of the Communal Bank "Club de La Amistad" (Friendship Club), which consists of eight members who engage in various retail businesses.  Maria sells candy from a street cart.  On Sundays, she sells tamales.  Maria started this business so that she could help her husband with the household expenses and the support of their seven children.  She works very hard to make use of each day that she has.  Thanks to her effort and dedication, Maria has been able install flooring in the rooms of her house.  Her income continues to increase.  Maria is requesting a new loan in order to buy merchandise, such as candy.  She will accomplish her goals through hard work and effort, and the loans from EDAPROSPO will be a great help.

loans.use: to buy snacks and supplies for their tamales

loans.name: Los Andenes Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Los Andenes” en el distrito del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por diez personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de artesanía, agricultura y otros brindan servicios profesionales y tecnicos como por ejemplo; empleado público, docencia, cajera, asistente de administrativo y asesor legal.
 
La socia Roxana nació en la ciudad de Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, tiene 42  años de edad, es padre y madre para su única hija. Su actividad económica principal de la socia Roxana es trabajar como empleada publica en una entidad del estado en el área de abastecimiento. Ya son varios años que trabaja en esa entidad y le ha ido muy bien. En esta oportunidad Roxana requiere el préstamo pues con un grupo de familiares abrirán un negocio de venta de artesanía entonces ella requiere el capital para invertir en el negocio osea quiere comprar joyas como por ejemplo aretes, pulseras, anillos y otros. Su sueño de Roxana es abrir una cadena de tienda de venta de artesanía. 

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends formed the Los Andenes communal bank in the Cusco district.  This communal bank is comprised of ten people who are looking every minute for opportunities to get ahead.  With daily effort they look to give their children a better future.  The business activities of the members are, for example, public employee, teacher, cashier, administrative assistant, and legal advisor.

Roxana was born in the city of Cusco, and she lives in the same city where she was born.  She is 42 years old, and she is both mother and father to her only daughter.  Roxana’s main business activity is working as a public employee in a state entity in the supply area.  It has been several years that she has worked in this entity, and it has gone very well for her.

Roxana needs the loan now.  A group of relatives will be opening a business selling handicrafts.  She needs the capital to invest in this business.  She wants to buy jewelry like earrings, bracelets, rings, and more.  Roxana’s dream is to open a chain store selling handicrafts.

The members are grateful for the opportunity offered to them, and they pledge to make their payments in a timely fashion.

Cusco is located in the district and province of Cusco in the Cusco department.  It is in the heart of the ancient city of the Incas.  It is known for being a tourist zone, its archeological centers, its historical center, its scenery, its history, and for being an enchanting city in the southern region of the country.  Cusco is known for being a big tourist area, for its commerce, for its traditional celebration of Inti Raymi (Festival of the Sun), and for Machupicchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy jewelry like earrings, bracelets, rings, and more.

loans.name: Lucero Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Lucero” en el distrito del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por nueve personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de fertilizantes, venta de artesanía, venta de muebles de madera, venta de golosinas, venta de comestibles, venta de cosméticos  y otros brindan servicios profesionales de enfermería, profesora y técnico electricista. 
 
(La socia Ines en la fotografía está levantando la mano). La socia Ines nació en la ciudad de Lima pero vive actualmente en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, es casada y fruto esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal de la socia es administrar el pequeño negocio de elaboración de artesanía de su pareja, el esposo de la socia es artesano y elabora pintura cusqueña como por ejemplo paisajes, niños, cholitas, calles de la ciudad del Cusco y otros cosas más, que su imaginación le permita. Ya son varios años que se dedican a este negocio y les ha ido muy bien. En esta oportunidad Ines requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo   pinceles, bastidores, acuarelas, lápices y otras cosas más. Su sueño de Ines es exportar sus pintura de su esposo al extranjero. 

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of friends and neighbors formed the community banking group “Lucero” in the district of Cusco. This community bank was created by nine people who are all looking at every turn for opportunities to get ahead and with their daily strength to bring about a better future for their children.  The economic ventures of the group members are, for example, fertilizer sales, sales of craft items, sales of wooden furniture, candy sales, food sales, sales of cosmetics, and others offer their professional services as a nurse, a teacher, and an electrician.
 
(Ines is the group member is raising her hand in the photo.) Ines was born in the city of Lima but currently resides in the beautiful city of Cusco.  She is married, and the fruits of this beautiful union have been two children.  Her principle commercial activity is the administration of a small business selling the arts made by her partner.  Her spouse is an artist and creates paintings of Cusco like passages, children, young women, vistas of Cusco's city streets, and more images, as his imagination permits.  It's been years now since they began this work together, and it has gone very well for them.  In this venture, Ines requires a loan to buy materials like paint brushes, frames, watercolors, pencils, and more.  Ines' dream is to export her husband's paintings to foreign markets.

The members of group as a whole are thankful for the opportunity presented to them and promise to make their payments of the debt on the timetable they have established.

Cusco is located in the district and province of Cusco in the department of Cusco, in the very heart of the old city of the Incas, and has a reputation as a tourist destination, for its archeological digs, the historic downtown, its little side streets, for its history and for being a truly enchanting city in the southern region of the country.  Cusco is most well-known for being a very touristy area, its commerce, and for the traditional festival of Inti Raymi, and because it is where one of the Seven Wonders of the World, “Machupicchu” is located.

loans.use: to buy materials, for example, brushes, frames, watercolors, pencils and other items.

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.es: La Sra.  María tiene 53 años y es casada con un hijo que tiene la edad de diez años, ella se dedica a la venta de dulces y golosinas en un puesto de venta que se encuentran ubicada en su mismo domicilio, Este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. María utilizara  este préstamo para compra de dulces, golosinas y chocolates para surtir su negocio, la razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital de trabajo, la Sra. María enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia, ella va a utilizar los beneficios en ahorrar para la compra de una casa ya que donde vive se encuentra en alquiler y ese es su deseo poder tener una casita para brindar mayor comodidad a su familia, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
María is 53 years old, and she is married with one child who is ten years old.  She works in sweets and treats sales in a shop located in her own home.  This loan is her first involvement with the lending institution.  María will use this loan to buy sweets, hard candies, and chocolates to stock her business.  The reason she is asking for a loan is that she lacks working capital, and María faces challenges to her business from her competitors.  

She will use the gain in business profits from her investment to buy her own home, since she currently lives in a rental unit, and it is her wish to have a little house to better accommodate her family.  She feels happy and thankful to the lenders for the opportunity they have presented to her.

loans.use: to buy sweets, hard candies, and chocolates to stock her shop.

loans.name: Los Angeles Group

texts.es: La Sra. Isabel es viuda, tiene 60 años  de edad y tiene 2 hijos, actualmente  es socia  en la alcancía comunal  “Los Ángeles” grupo  conformado por  12  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Isabel  se dedica a la venta de comida en un puesto en el mercado, Isabel empezó vendiendo en carreta ahora ya tiene mesas y sillas para vender su comida, A su vez vende gaseosas Isabel trabaja en este negocio desde hace 35 años,  hoy en día ya cuenta con clientes fidelizados, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a, mejorado su casa, sus hijos tuvieron educación. Isabel  solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar insumos para la preparación de su comida (fideos, leche,  etc). Isabel cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de edaprospo  la ayudaran.
texts.en:
Isabel is a widow, she is 60 years old and she has 2 children. Currently, she is a member of the communal bank Los Ángeles [The Angels] which consists of 12 members who make a living in diverse business activities. Isabel  makes a living selling food at a stall in the market. 

Isabel started selling out of a cart, and now she already has tables and chairs to sell her food. She also sells sodas. Isabel has worked in this business for 35 years and now she has faithful customers. Thanks to her effort and dedication, she has improved her house and her children got an education. 

Isabel is applying for a new loan to buy supplies for the preparation of her food (noodles, milk, etc.) Isabel will accomplish her goals with a lot of work and effort and the loans from EDAPROSPO will help her.

loans.use: to buy supplies for food preparation (noodles, milk, etc.)

loans.name: Cristo Y Nuestro Esfuerzo 5 And 7 Group

texts.en:
Leonel makes his home in a simple structure with his four children and his new long-term partner. He says that his most difficult challenge has been raising his children without their mother. While he continues to do so, he intends to carry on attending church.

Leonel is excited to be taking his 8th loan with Esperanza, having successfully repaid his previous loans and grown his business. He has had his business for almost twelve years. He plans to use this loan to invest in his business by buying shoes by the dozen in different sizes and colors. He has been saving part of his business profits to build a house, to pay for his children's studies and to provide other needs.

Leonel is the coordinator of his group Cristo y Nuestro Esfuerzo (Christ and Our Effort) 5 and 7. This group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourism industry dominate the economy.

loans.use: by shoes to resell

loans.name: Cristo Y Nuestro Esfuerzo 2 Group

texts.en:
Raynold is one of the members in the group called Cristo y Nuestro Esfuerzo 2 (Christ and Our Effort). He makes his home in a simple structure with his three children and his long-term partner. He says that his most important challenge is take home enough incoming for his family needs. 

Raynold is excited to be taking his 6th loan with Esperanza, having successfully repaid his previous loans and grown his business. He plans to use this loan to invest in his business by buying shoes and cosmetics like body lotion, perfume, deodorant and other products. He will use the profits to invest in his business and to take home money for food, clothes and other needs. 

This group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To buy shoes, body lotion and perfume to sell

loans.name: We Yone Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you members of the “We Yone” group. These small-scale entrepreneurs have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 1,200,000 SLL for each of them in order to invest in their respective businesses. 

Fatmata is the leader of this group. Fatmata is 42 years old and married with four children. One of her children is in primary school, two are in secondary school and one is in college. Fatmata sells cooked rice mixed with sauce. With the help of this loan, she will invest in her business by buying cooking ingredients like uncooked rice, fish, palm oil, tomatoes, onions, etc. in large quantities in order to produce a larger quantity of cooked rice for sale.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like uncooked rice, fish, palm oil, tomatoes, onions, etc. in large quantities

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits for sale.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.en:
Hilda, 29, and her husband Peter have three children. For the past eight years, Hilda has been operating a restaurant in her home town, Nakuru.

Hilda was introduced to KADET LTD by one of their field officers, and this is her first loan from the company. She will use the loan to purchase supplies like cooking fat, flour, sugar, and cups for her restaurant.
 
She hopes to expand her business and transfer it to a bigger hotel in the future.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her restaurant.

loans.name: Boldbaatar

texts.en:
Boldbaatar is a 52-year-old man who lives with his wife and two children in a suburban area of Ulaanbaatar City, Mongolia. His wife is unemployed, and his youngest child studies at the secondary school. He has been running a taxi service since 2010. His business activity is now stable, and he has gained many regular customers. 

Boldbaatar's van needs repairs because it has been damaged by bad roads. He is a diligent man who says, "I would like to continue my business activities by having my van repaired." The total amount he is requesting is 2,000,000 MNT to repair and paint his van.

loans.use: to repair and paint his van.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 22 years old and a mixed crop farmer. He and his wife Jane, also a farmer, are blessed with two children. He has been in the farming business for the past six years earning a monthly income of 10,000 KES, which he uses to support his family.

After repaying his previous loans successfully, Samuel is applying for his third loan from KADET LTD to purchase fertilizer and seedlings for his farm. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes one day to buy his own piece of land.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Altansuh

texts.en:
Altansuh is a 44-year-old man who lives with his wife and three children in the Arhangai province of Central Mongolia. His oldest child is a college student and his younger children study at the secondary school. 

Altansuh started a garment retail business in 2005 with his wife. His business is famous in the local area, and there are a number of regular customers. 

Altansuh is a diligent man who says, "I would like to expand my business activities by purchasing supplies in wholesale." The total amount he is requesting is 2,500,000 MNT to buy more supplies.

loans.use: to buy more supplies for her garment business.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 49-year-old married woman. She has two children who are 20 and 22 years old. She describes herself as jovial, customer friendly, humble, determined, and aggressive in her business. 

Mary operates a tailoring shop where she sells items like skirt suits, school uniforms, and sweaters. She has been involved in this business for 25 years and employs one staff member. Her business is located in a busy shopping mall, and her primary customers are women and parents with children in school. She describes customer turnover as one of her biggest business challenges. 

Previously Mary took out and repaid three loans of 80,000 KES. She will use the current 90,000 KES loan to purchase rolls of cloth. Her business goal is to increase her number of clients within five years. She anticipates using the profits from the loan to purchase a plot of land and build a house.

loans.use: to buy material for her tailoring shop.

loans.name: Damdin

texts.en:
Damdin is a 47-year-old man who lives with his wife in a suburban area of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. His children are independent. He started a taxi service business in 2007. Previously he had experience working in Korea as a driver. Now he is considered to be a talented and careful driver. He has many regular customers. The business activities are stable now. 

Damdin is a diligent man who says, "I hope this loan will help my life.” The total amount he is requesting is 2,000,000 MNT to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is the mother of two school-attending children. She operates a grocery where she sells her goods from home. She has been in this business for the past two years and she dreams of opening a kiosk in the future. 

Mwanasiti owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Other sources of income include earnings from her spouse. She spends more on food for the family over the month. The loan of Ksh 20,000 will help her purchase onions, tomatoes, potatoes, and other vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase onions, tomatoes, potatoes, and other vegetables.

loans.name: Basti

texts.en:
Basti is a 58-year-old widow. She lives with her family, three children, ages 26, 27, and 33. 

She has been involved in the cattle-breeding business for more than fifteen years. She sells meat and milk products at the bazaar. Also, she is engaged in farming. In the future she wants to expand the farming activity. Now she has applied for 1,000 AZN to buy grass and feed for her animals.

loans.use: to buy grass and feed for her animals.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 26 years old and single. He is a milk vendor and has been in the business for the past two years. He gets a monthly income of KES 10,000 from the business.

This is his first loan. He was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers. He will use the loan amount to purchase milk from farmers for resale in places of low production.

He hopes to accumulate savings that can enable him to purchase a dairy cow, so that he may increase milk sales.

loans.use: to purchase milk from farmers for resale.

loans.name: Enas

texts.en:
Enas is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Alaa appears in her Kiva profile photo. He is pictured next to the taxi he wants to purchase.

Enas is a 36-year-old woman. She is married to Alaa and a mother to three sons and two daughters. Her husband is employed and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs. To improve the family's income, for the past six months Enas' husband has been working as a taxi driver. This has been a profitable project, but he needs more support to cover the costs.

Enas wants to share with her husband in improving the family's source of income, so she has decided to request a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing the taxi. This will offer to Enas and her family better living conditions as the family's income will increase.

loans.use: to complete the price of purchasing the taxi.

loans.name: Elisabeth

texts.en:
Elisabeth is 35 years old and married with three children between 6 and 11 years old.  She sells various goods such as juice, water, lotions, biscuits, soap, etc and she has been in this business for 10 years. Her business is open from 8 am to 9 pm every day of the week. 

Elisabeth has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as juice, water, lotions, biscuits. soap, etc to sell. With any profits, she will be able to save for her future and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase various goods such as juice, water, lotions, biscuits. soap,  etc  to sell.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is a married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 15 years to 25 years. She describes herself to be determined. 

Tabitha operates a retail business where she sells sweaters. She has been involved in this business for ten years. Her business is located is located within a town and her primary customers are people who come to visit the town. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate capital for restocking. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy sweaters for selling. Her business goal is to expand her business within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be supplying sweaters to other major towns in Kenya.

loans.use: to buy sweaters.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy stock of micro-solar lighting kits from Barefoot Power.

loans.name: Hebert Johnny

texts.es:
Hebert es un hombre que  tiene  26 años de edad es de  estado civil soltero, y vive en la casa de sus padres junto con ellos, él  domicilia en  el caserío Los Bances, distrito de  Túcume del departamento de Lambayeque; así mismo se indica que este sector solo cuenta con energía eléctrica y el consumo de agua lo hacen a través de norias artesanales, la mayoría de familias viven bajo estas condiciones.

La actividad comercial a la que se dedica Hebert  es la compra/  venta de animales como ovejas, chivos, cerdos  patos, pavos, y cuenta con experiencia de  03  años. Así mismo este negocio está ubicado en la parte posterior de su casa (en corrales), donde cuenta con clientela ya establecida (es decir personas que le venden los animales); y  él al mismo tiempo comercializa los animales a los comerciantes mayoristas de la zona; adicionalmente es agricultor donde le permite tener otros ingresos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando  Hebert es de S/. 1,000 nuevos soles y estará destinado para  comprar más animales, alimento para engorde y arreglo de corrales. De esta manera se ha propuesto ampliar su inventario y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hebert is a man of 26 years and is single.  He lives at home with his parents in their home, which is located in the neighborhood of Los Bances, the district of Túcume of the Lambayeque department; this is a locale where it is understood that there is only basic electrical service and the water comes from a small water wheel (noria), and the majority of families live under similar conditions.

The working activities of Herbert are the acquisition and sale of animals like sheep, goats, pigs, ducks, and turkeys and he has 3 years of prior experience in his field.  This activity is located in the rear of his house (in corrals), where he has an already established customer base (which is to say, people who buy his animals).  At the same time, he sells animals to some of the best businesspeople in his area, and he is also a farmer, which gives him an additional source of income.

The loan that Herbert is asking for is 1,000 Soles, and it will be designated for buying more animals, feed to fatten them, and to make repairs of corrals.  With this, he plans to increase his total inventory and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animals, feed to fatten them, and to repair corrals.

loans.name: Shadrack

texts.en:
Shadrack is 30 years old. He is married to Emily and together they have two children. He is a charcoal seller and has been in the business for the past five years.

This is his third loan from KADET LTD. He paid his previous loans well and in good time. He will use the loan amount to purchase stock of firewood for resale in his business.

He hopes to get a permanent premises for his business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of firewood for resale in his business.

loans.name: Wilson Chege

texts.en:
This is Wilson's forth loan. He paid his previous loans and in good time. He plans to use the loan amount to purchase fertilizer and potato seedlings for planting on his farm.

In the future, Wilson hopes to build rental houses to increase and diversify his income.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and potato seedlings for planting on his farm

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en: Mwanasha is a mother of six children, three of whom are in school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Mwanasha has been operating a fish-selling business where she sells her fish at the market to the local residents. She has been in this business for the last ten years. Seasonality is her major challenge because she experiences scarcity of fish at certain periods. She joined Yehu to get loans to boost her business. With the loan of Ksh 15,000, she plans on purchasing fish and cooking oil.

loans.use: to purchase fish and cooking oil

loans.name: Biasha

texts.en: Biasha is a married woman with three adult children. She sells cashew nuts at the market, and she has been doing so for the past ten years. She dreams of opening a shop in the future. Biasha lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Seasonality of the product is her major challenge, and she describes buying food for the family to be her greatest monthly expense. With the loan of Ksh 30,000, she will be able to purchase cashew nuts to sell.

loans.use: to purchase cashew nuts to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy charcoal for fire and oil and flour for preparing snacks and cakes to sell

loans.name: Nuestra Señora De Guadalupe Group

texts.es: El Banco Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe, está conformado por 10 integrantes en el cual todas son mujeres emprendedoras y luchadoras que buscan el bienestar de ellas y de su familia. Este grupo ya ha tenido crédito con Fundación León 2000, en el cual han sido excelente clientas y ellas nos explican que gracias al apoyo que les han brindado con el financiamiento ha incrementado su inversión y su clientela ofreciéndoles variedad de producto a sus clientes. Rosa Argentina es una emprendedora que se ha unido a este grupo para salir adelante y apoyarse entre ellas mismas, su actividad económica  a la que se dedica es a la pulpería actualmente está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra: arroz frijoles, aceite, azúcar, jabón, pasta dental, detergente, entre otros productos que le están demandando su clientela.
texts.en:
The Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe communal bank is composed of ten members, all of whom are determined, enterprising women whose goal is the well-being of themselves and their families. This group already had a loan with Fundación León 2000, in which they have been excellent clients. They explain that thanks to the support that was granted to them with financing, they have increased their investment and their customer base by offering a variety of products to their customers.

Rosa Argentina is a businesswoman who has joined this group to get ahead and enjoy mutual support. Her business is a small grocery store. She is currently requesting a loan to invest in the business with the purchase of rice, beans, oil, sugar, soap, toothpaste, and detergent, among other products that her customers are requesting.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, oil, sugar, soap, toothpaste, and detergent, along with other products that her customers are requesting.

loans.name: Sixto

texts.es: El Sr. Sixto  tiene 29 años y es casado con 2 hijos que son de las edades de 1 y 3 años de edad, el se dedica al armado de distintas estructuras de metal en su    cerrajería, su taller se encuentran en la zona  de la Ciudad del Niño,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Sixto utilizara  este préstamo para compra de arco y oxigeno por su taller, la razón para solicitar este préstamo es necesidad de agrandar su negocio con la compra de herramientas de trabajo, el Sr. Sixto enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que por la zona existen varias cerrajerías y los problemas sociales ya que existen bloqueos de calles y esto  no les permite tener clientes, y  va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir mejorando sus herramientas y negocio. El Sr. Sixto es una persona joven y trabajadora su deseo es crecer en su taller  e ir mejorando su negocio día a día para así generar mayores ingresos para mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Sixto is 29 years old. He is married and has two children who are 1 and 3 years old. He makes a living making different structures out of metal in his welding shop. His shop is located in the area of Ciudad del Niño. 

This is the first loan he has taken out through the communal bank. He will use the loan to buy an arc welder and oxygen for his metal shop. The reason he requested a loan is because he needs to increase the size of his business with the purchase of more work tools. He has come across challenges in his business which include competition, because there are many welding shops in the area, as well as social problems, because there are road blocks which keeps customers from being able to have easy access to his shop.  

He will use the loan to continue improving his tools and business. Sixto is a very hard working young man. His hope is to strengthen his shop and continue improving his business day by day, to increase profits and be able to support his family.

loans.use: to buy an arc welder and oxygen for his metal shop.

loans.name: Rogelio Damián

texts.es: Desde que tenía 15 años Rogelio ha trabajado con el café y fue su padre quien le enseñó todo lo relacionado con esta actividad y al cumplir 18 años se independizó para trabajar en sus propias tierras. El mismo trabaja en sus parcelas aunque tiene personal que lo ayuda a realizar todas las actividades ya que también trabaja para la “Unión Regional de Huatusco” como catador de café, actividad en la cual invierte mucho tiempo, pues tiene que seleccionar café de primera calidad para que sea exportado. Durante la última cosecha Rogelio tuvo una producción total de 9 toneladas y tiene planeado que en un lapso de 3 años su finca llegue a producir un total de 12 toneladas, pues tiene la extensión de terreno necesaria para que esto sea posible. Rogelio necesita un crédito para comprar fertilizantes y de esta manera poder cumplir la meta que se ha propuesto. Dejando un poco de lado el cultivo de café, una de las necesidades que él tiene actualmente es reparar el acceso para entrar a su casa, pues se encuentra en mal estado y esto ocasiona que se golpee su automóvil.
texts.en: Rogelio has worked with coffee plants since he was 15 years old.  His father taught him everything to do with the business, and once he turned 18 years old, Rogelio went out on his own to work his own lands.  Even though he has employees that help him carry out the daily activities, Rogelio himself works his plots of land.  Rogelio also works for the “Unión Regional de Huatusco” (Huatusco Regional Union) as a coffee taster.  He invests a lot of time in his coffee tasting, as he has to select the finest quality coffee for export.  During the last harvest, Rogelio had a total production of 9 tons of coffee.  He plans, in the course of 3 years, to have his farm producing a total of 12 tons of coffee.  He has the necessary expanse of land to make it possible.  Rogelio needs a loan to purchase fertilizers, which will allow him to meet the goal he has set for himself.  Leaving the coffee crop to one side, another of Rogelio's current needs is to repair the access to his house.  It's in bad conditions and is damaging his car.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for his plot of land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a welding machine for remote-controlled gates.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa, solicita un nuevo préstamo para el mejoramiento del negocio de pupuseria y bebidas, comprándose una cantidad de bebidas en variedad y materia prima para la pupuseria como maíz, aceite, quesillo, utensilios para el empaque, entre otros que son necesarios para el buen funcionamiento del negocio.
Ella manifiesta que con esta ayuda ella siente mayor seguridad en el negocio, pues obtienen el recurso económico para comprarse lo necesario y mejorar las ventas, tambien así mejora el servicio a los clientes.
texts.en: Rosa is asking for a new loan to improve her business selling pupusas [stuffed, grilled corn cakes] and beverages by purchasing a quantity of beverages and raw materials for pupusas like corn, oil, string cheese and packaging supplies, among others that are needed for the good functioning of the business.  She states that with this help she’ll feel more secure in the business because she’ll have the economic resources to buy what she needs and to improve sales; she will also improve customer service this way.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil, string cheese and packaging supplies.

loans.name: Yola Natividad

texts.es: La Sra. Yola tiene 44 años y es madre soltera con 3 hijos que son de las edades de 19 años, 9 años y 5 años, ella se dedica a la venta de desayuno que se encuentran en mercado de la zona cerca a su domicilio, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Yola utilizara este préstamo para la compra de mesas,  bancas y sillas para su negocio, la razón para solicitar este préstamo es  que no les brinda una comodidad a sus clientes ya que no tienen donde sentarse, este es el reto que enfrenta  en su negocio ya que brindar la comodidad a sus clientes es un reto que tiene que superar, también la competencia ya que hay muchas señoras de su mismo gremio en el mercado, y va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de muebles para seguir mejorando su negocio porque los muebles que tiene se están deteriorando por la antigüedad que tienen, la Sra. Yola es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Yola, 44, is a single mother of three children whose ages are 19, 9 and 5 years.  She sells breakfasts in a market in the area near her home.  

This loan is her first sequence within the institution.  Yola will use this loan to buy tables, benches and chairs for her business.  

The reason for requesting the loan is that she does not offer much comfort to her customers because they don’t have anywhere to sit and this is the challenge her business faces because providing customer comfort is one of the challenges she must overcome.  

There is also competition because there are many women in her same line of work in the market and she’s going to use profits to buy furniture to continue improving her business because the furniture she has is falling apart because they are so ole.  

Yola is a very hardworking person who feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy tables, benches and chairs.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 35 years old, married to Joyce and blessed with three children. He has been a tea farmer for the last seven years, earning a monthly income of KES 8,000. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 10,000 from KADET LTD and he plans to purchase pesticides and top dressing fertilizers to boost the quality of his tea output. 

This will lead to a bigger and better crop yield. The anticipated profits will be used to support the business. His future dreams are to expand his farm acreage and attain financial success

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Gonzalo Armando

texts.es:
Gonzalo, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en la productividad de los granos básicos, pues está iniciando la siembra de maíz y ajonjolí, comprara abono, herbicidas, semilla mejorada, para comenzar la milpa.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo a mejorar sus cosechas de granos básicos, ya que le facilito los materiales para aplicarlos y de eso dependió la producción, con esa cosecha mantuvo para la alimentación de su familia, hasta la fecha se mantienen en buenas condiciones y buena salud.
texts.en:
Gonzalo is asking for a new loan to invest in his basic grains’ productivity because he’s starting to plant corn and sesame.  He will buy manure, herbicide and improved seeds to start his corn fields.

The previous loan helped him improve his harvests of basic grains because he was able to get the supplies and apply them and that’s what production depended on.  With that harvest he was able to support his family who to date are in good conditions and in good health.

loans.use: to buy manure, herbicide and improved seeds.

loans.name: Leonidas

texts.es:
Leónidas, vive en casa propia, es viudo, vive solo, trabaja en la agricultura para mantenerse, él aprendió el proceso de la siembra cuando era joven y su padre le inculco el oficio, ya tiene experiencia en este trabajo.
Actualmente está iniciando la siembra y solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra de los materiales que son necesarios como el abono y herbicidas, que son muy útiles para fortalecer la siembra, este préstamo le dará la ayuda económica para comprarse lo necesario y realizar la milpa. 
La aspiración de Leónidas es que su trabajo sea prospero, obteniendo buenas cosechas, ya que le permitirá mantenerse para cubrir los gastos diarios y su alimentación.
texts.en:
Leónidas lives in his own house; he’s a widower.  He works in agriculture to support himself.  He learned the planting process when he was young and his father introduced him into the occupation; he has experience in this type of work.

He is currently starting the planting and is asking for a loan to buy the necessary supplies like manure and herbicide that are very useful for strengthening the crops.  This loan will give him economic help to buy what he needs and establish his cornfields.

Leónidas’ hope is that his work will be prosperous obtaining good harvests because that will allow him to cover his daily expenses and his food costs.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Segundina

texts.es: La Sra. Segundina tiene 49 años y es madre  soltera con 3 hijos que son de las edades de  10, 14 y 17 años, ella se dedica al comercio de ropa que se encuentran en uno de los mercados de la localidad de Sacaba,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Segundina utilizara este préstamo para la construcción de un cuarto de baño para su domicilio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es no tiene ingresos suficientes como para construir ambientes en su casa, Segundina enfrenta retos en su negocio que son el no tener una caseta fija y va a utilizar los beneficios en ir comprando material de construcción para seguir mejorando su domicilio, ahora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución ya que tendrá un cuarto mas para brindar mayor comodidad a sus hijos, su deseo es  tener una caseta propia y estabilidad en su negocio.
texts.en:
Segundina, 39, is a single mother with two children, ages 10, 14, and 17.  She works selling clothing in one of the markets in the town of Sacaba.  This loan is her second sequence with the institution.

Segundina will use this loan to build a bathroom for her home.  Her reason for requesting this loan is that she does not have enough income to build rooms in her house.

Segundina faces challenges in her business such as not having a fixed stand.  She is going to use the profits to buy construction material to continue improving her home.  Now she is happy and grateful to the institution because she will have another room to give her children greater comfort.

Her goal is to have her own stand and stability in her business.

loans.use: to build a room.

loans.name: Pio Xii Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento  PIO XII está compuesto por diez integrantes, ocho mujeres y dos varones, la presidenta del banco es La Sra. Teodosia  tiene 43 años y es casada con 4 hijos que son de las edades de 23, 20, 19 y 16 años, ella se dedica al tejido de mantas de manera artesanal desde hace ya varios años, su domicilio se encuentra  en el Zona de Barrio Municipal, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la señora Teodosia va a usar este préstamo para la compra de material de construcción para la  construcción de un cuarto en su casa su  razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de dinero para la compra de material de construcción,  la señora  Teodosia desea con el tiempo abrir una tienda propia para exponer sus tejidos ya que ahora entrega en los distintos mercados de la Ciudad y de la zona y va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
The entrepreneurial banking group PIO XII is made up of ten members, eight women and two men, and the president of the group is Teodosia.  She is 43 years old and married with 4 children, ages 23, 20, 19, and 16.  She has been in the business of making hand-woven blankets for many years, and she lives in the neighborhood of Barrio Municipal.

This loan is her first one with the lending partner, and Teodosia will use the funds to buy construction materials for constructing a new room in her house.  Her reason for asking for this loan is that she lacks money to buy the construction materials herself.  Teodosia wants to eventually open a shop of her own to show her woven goods, since she currently takes them to many different markets around the city and in her own neighborhood, and she will use the benefits to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for the construction of a new room for her house.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Buscando El Triunfo Group

texts.es:
Doña Luz es la presidenta de Banco Mujer Buscando El Triunfo, tiene  muchos años de pertenecer a este grupo, y se ha caracterizado por su responsabilidad y puntualidad, al igual que todas las integrantes de su grupo.
Ella tiene 42 años, y es madre de 3 hijos, todos adolecentes y estudiantes. Ella comenzó su actividad para poder generar más ingresos a su hogar y también ayudarle a sus hijos con el estudio, ya que su compañero trabaja como peón agrícola y percibe un ingreso muy bajo. 
Está señora es comerciante, vende perfumes de forma ambulante en su comunidad y  en otras cercanas, tiene mucha experiencia en los negocios, este es el cuarto crédito que solicita. Y al igual que los anteriores es su oportunidad de hacer inversiones más fuertes de capital de trabajo. 
Con Luz hay 5 socias más que van a invertir en actividades comerciales y agropecuarias.
texts.en:
Doña Luz is the president of the Women's Community Bank "Buscando El Triunfo," and she has many years of membership in this group, in which she has been known for her responsibility and punctuality, just as is true of all the members of her group.

She is 42 years old and the mother of three children, all of who are teenagers and students.  She began her business to create more income for her home, and also to help her children by paying for their studies, since her partner works as an agricultural laborer and receives a very low salary.

This woman is a businessperson, and she sells perfumes door to door in her community and the neighboring areas.  She has a lot of experience in business, and this is the fourth loan she has received.  Just as with the previous loans, she will be using the opportunity to make investments with a greater working capital.

Along with Luz, there are 5 other members of the group who will invest in business activities and agriculture.

loans.use: to buy perfumes for resale.

loans.name: John

texts.es:
John tiene 24 años, es un joven soltero que vive con sus padres y sus dos hermanos menores. La casa es propia y se ubicada en el barrio de Bellavista de Tarma.

De niño apoyaba a sus padres en la limpieza y en la cosecha de sus productos. Como sus padres veían lo efectivo de su trabajo decidieron otorgarle su propio terreno. Es así que empezó a sembrar arvejas, habas, papas y hortalizas. “Sí es rentable la venta de estos productos, pero también se invierte mucho en semillas, abono y peones”, comenta.
John ya tiene clientes conocidos y son intermediarios mayoristas de un caserío a 40 minutos de su zona. Sus ganancias las invertía en sus estudios de mantenimiento de maquinarias, ahora que ya culminó, continúa dedicándose a la agricultura y manejando vehículos grandes hacia la selva central. 
John es un joven de planes claros, para el futuro espera comprar más terrenos agrícolas para sembrar en mayores cantidades con la ayuda de su familia, que siempre lo apoya.

Él pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay” y le gusta el trabajo solidario entre los socios. Éste es su cuarto préstamo con MFP, menciona sentirse agradecido por la ayuda que recibe de la entidad, por eso promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
El dinero que ahora solicita le servirá para la compra de semillas de papas y bolsas de fertilizantes para iniciar una siembra grande.
texts.en:
John, 24, is a young, single man living with his parents and two younger siblings.  The house is theirs and it’s located in Tarma’s Bellavista neighborhood.

As a child he’d help his parents weeding and harvesting .  When his parents saw how effectively he worked they decided to give him his own land.  This is how he started growing peas, lima beans, potatoes and greens.  “The sale of these products is profitable but one also has to invest much seed, manure and laborers,” he comments.

John already has established customers that are wholesaler middlemen in a settlement 40 minutes from his zone.  He used to invest his profits in his machine maintenance courses but now that he’s completed them he continues working in agriculture and driving large vehicles into the central jungle.

John is a young man with clear plans for the future.  He plans to buy more farmland to plant larger quantities with help from his family who always supports him.

He belongs to the “Señor de Muruhuay” communal bank and he likes it because of the mutually supportive work of all the members.  This is his fourth loan with MFP and he mentions that he feels grateful for the help he gets from this entity and this is why he promises to be punctual with his installment payments.

The money he’s requesting now will be of use to buy potato seeds and sacks of fertilizer to start a large planting.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Athanasie

texts.en:
Athanasie is 51 years old and married with five children between 16 and 26 years old. In addition, she takes care of two relatives. She sells various goods such as juice, water, cakes, bread, soap, milk, etc. and she has been in this business for 21 years. Her business is open from 7 am to 10 pm every day of the week and she currently employs two people to help her. 

Athanasie has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as juice, water, cakes, bread, soap, milk, etc. to sell. With any profits, she will be able to save for her future and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy juice, water, cakes, bread, soap, milk, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
Luzmila tiene 32 años, vive con Freddy, con quien tiene 2 hijos; Brayan y Cielo. La casa sonde viven es alquilada y está ubicada en el distrito de Acobamba en Tarma.

A los 17 años se inició en las labores de la agricultura, ya tenía ciertos conocimientos debido a que sus padres se dedican a esa actividad. Sus principales sembríos constan de arvejas, habas,  maíz y otras hortalizas. Con la ayuda de su esposo  puede abarcar todo el trabajo sacrificado que es cuidar sus sembríos. “Bellavista es una zona que produce buenos choclos (maíz tierno) por eso la mayoría de compradores llegan hasta ahí”, comenta orgullosa. 
Por su parte, Fredy  también se dedica al servicio de transporte de pasajeros, de esa manera pueden solventar sus gastos principales, y más aún con los gastos escolares de sus hijos, quienes cada vez le exigen materiales de estudio.
Una de sus metas es construir su casa propia, para ello ya cuenta con un terreno propio, pero no dispone de tiempo para realizarlo. Esta vez sí piensa concretizar ese objetivo.

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay” y éste sería su crédito número 11 con MFP. Se siente agradecida por el apoyo que recibe dentro del grupo y promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Luzmila invertirá el dinero que solicita en la compra de bolsas de abono para su siembra de maíz que iniciará en junio, lo restante será para empezar a construir su casa.
texts.en:
Luzmila is 32 years old and lives with Freddy, with whom she has 2 children; Brayan and Cielo.  They live in a rented house in the Acobamba district of Tarma.
She started farming when she was 17 years old, at which point she already knew some things about the activity because her parents are farmers.  Her main crops are peas, beans, corn and other vegetables.  With the help of her husband she can handle all the sacrificing tasks involved in taking care of her fields.  "Bellavista is an area that produces good corn on the cob, that is why many buyers go there" she proudly comments.
Freddy also works providing passenger transport services, in this manner they can cover their main expenses, especially the educational costs of their children, who constantly need school supplies.
One of their goals is to build their own house.  They already own a lot of land but do not have the time to carry out the project.  At this time they plan to realize this goal.
She belongs to the community bank “Señor de Muruhuay” an this is her 11th loan with MFP.  She feels very grateful for the support that she gets from the group and promises to repay the loan on time.
Luzmila will invest the money that she is requesting in the purchase of bags of fertilizer for her corn crop which she will plant in June.  The remainder of the money will be used to construct their house.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Alina

texts.es:
Alina tiene 33 años, vive con Diego, con quien tiene dos hijos: Sarai y Cristofer. Su casa es propia y se ubica en el caserío de Huaracayo en Tarma.

Ella es una mujer agricultora, todas las mañanas se dirige al caserío donde se ubican sus terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, maíz, arvejas y hortalizas. “El trabajo es cansado, más aún cuando llega la siembra o cosecha, por eso mi esposo y yo contratamos personal”, afirma. 
Uno de los inconvenientes y con lo que tiene que lidiar en cada siembra son las plagas que atacan sus frutos, pero Alina es persistente e inteligente, y ya sabe cómo contrarrestar estos problemas.
